note.p: Education: Cheltenham; Royal Military Academy, Woolwich

Career: Joined the Royal Artillery (1872); retired as Major; served in India; returned to England; Instructor in Mathematics, Woolwich (1882); Professor of Physics, Ordnance College (1890); Deputy Warden of the Standards, Board of Trade (1904-1920); member of Governing Body, Winchester College (1899-1924)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1930 vol 127 pp x-xvii, plate
